data1.title: Experienced Ruby on Rails Developer needed
data1.description: I'm a Senior Developer and former Microsoft employee, looking for an mid/senior developer to help me out with some of my day to day work. I am looking for someone who is a fast learner to help us develop new features in a large corporate web application. Proven Ruby on Rails experience is a must.

data2.title: Simple popup
data2.description: Hello, I need a popup created for me to be pasted on certain pages of my website: Please visit https://www hippovideo.io/ I want the same popup when you press the button 'Get Demo' I want this added to my website on two pages once you submit the form it redirects to calendly Thanks

data3.title: ASP.NET Developer for Long Term Project
data3.description: At this moment we have two projects for you: 1. Huge health-care project. Main technology stack: ASP.NET MVC AngularJS + Angular. Here the team just started migration process from AngularJS to Angular. So, there will be a lot of points of technical growth. E.g., to use micro-frontends to integrate both AngularJS and Angular parts together. Good news: you do NOT have to have experience with Angular.

data4.title: Software Engineer (Golang)
data4.description: Design and build scalable microservices and REST APIs to the standards to expose business capabilities for internal and external consumers. Writing scalable, robust, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code.

data5.title: Vue.js Developer
data5.description: Looking for someone who knows vue.js to make design changes/additions of functionality to a website design project. Some of the tasks required: Add select all / deselect all checkbox option to table Add onclick function and auto-populate input fields

data6.title: Setup Xmpp Media upload
data6.description: Hello i already setup the ejabberd server and installed adium as a client. sending messages is working fine but i'm struggling to get the sending media feature to work
